DataElement.preferredName: Patient Within Integer::4 Month Last Treatment Eligibility Determination Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator regarding criteria to determine eligibility of patients based on having had prior treatment within past 4 months.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Within Integer::4 Month Last Treatment Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information regarding criteria to determine eligibility of patients based on having had prior treatment within past 4 months.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Within Integer::4 Month Last Therapy Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: On the inside; contained in.:A number with no fractional part.::4:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: GOG CRF:Gynecologic Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
